sentence.Network_en: His reaction was as much of a rebuff as a physical recoil.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的反应既是身体的退缩，也是一种断然的拒绝。

sentence.Network_en: The results of the poll dealt a humiliating rebuff to Mr Jones.
sentence.Network_cn: 民意调查的结果对琼斯先生很不利，让他颜面尽失。

sentence.Network_en: Her offer of help was met with a sharp rebuff.
sentence.Network_cn: 她主动帮忙，却遭到断然拒绝。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... rebellious 反叛的 rebuff 回绝 rebuild 重建.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... rage 大怒 rebuff 断然拒绝 rebut 反驳.
击字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 击铁〖 hamlet〗 击退〖 rebuff;repel;repulse;beatback;beatoff〗 击玉敲金〖 invaluableadvice〗.
常用口语词汇27_专业词汇 ... reassure v. 使安心，安慰 rebuff vt. 严厉拒绝 recalcitrant adj. 固执的，顽抗的.

list.abs: His rude behaviour subjects him to frequent rebuffs ., 他的粗鲁行为使他经常遭受冷遇.
March &laquo; 2006 &laquo; dream... ... 碰触碰触/ to touch/ 碰钉子碰钉子/ meet with a rebuff/ 碰撞碰撞/ collide/.
Her rebuff thoroughly deflated him ., 她的拒绝使他的骄气大挫.
... 碰一鼻子灰 meet with a rebuff 自讨没趣(自讨没趣) to ask for a snub;to court a rebuff 窝脖儿(窝脖儿) rebuff;snub.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete French rebuffer (verb), rebuffe (noun), from Italian ri- (expressing opposition) + buffo 'a gust, puff', of imitative origin

entry.def: If you rebuff someone or rebuff a suggestion that they make, you refuse to do what they suggest.

example.ex: He wanted sex with Julie but she rebuffed him...
example.tran: 他想和朱莉上床但被她拒绝了。

example.ex: His proposals have already been rebuffed by the Prime Minister.
example.tran: 他的提议已经被首相否决了。

means.word_mean: 1. a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval)
2. an instance of driving away or warding off

auth_sentence.content: It is the adults resposnibility to rebuff any such advances, period.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the adults resposnibility to rebuff any such advances, period.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is the adults resposnibility to rebuff any such advances, period.

auth_sentence.content: Never since the rebuff from Maria had he been able to display affection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never since the rebuff from Maria had he been able to display affection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never since the rebuff from Maria had he been able to display affection.

auth_sentence.content: It is the latest rebuff by Naoto Kan to those insisting he quickly resign.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the latest rebuff by Naoto Kan to those insisting he quickly resign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is the latest rebuff by Naoto Kan to those insisting he quickly resign.

sentences.en: Her efforts were met with a sharp rebuff.
sentences.cn: 她的努力遭到了断然拒绝。

sentences.en: His rude behaviour subjects him to frequent rebuffs.
sentences.cn: 他的粗鲁行为使他经常遭受冷遇。

sentences.en: He avoided speaking to her, expecting a rebuff.
sentences.cn: 他料想会受到她的冷遇，于是避免和她说话。

sentences.en: My father was too proud to risk a rebuff, so he simply did not ask her.
sentences.cn: 我父亲自尊心太强怕被拒绝，所以根本就没问她。

sentences.en: She suffered a rebuff from her manager when she raised the matter.
sentences.cn: 她向经理提出这个问题时碰了一鼻子灰。
